features: 【ADA Toilet 】HOMLYLINK two piece modern toilet height is 17 inch from the floor to seat. The increased height of this bathroom toilet reduces the strain on the knees and joints, making it more comfortable for users to sit and stand. This creates to be usable by people of all ages and abilities, promoting inclusivity and a user-friendly experience for everyone!

【Powerful 360-degree Jet Siphon Flushing】HOMLYLINK 1.1/1.6 GPF for bathroom toilet are engineered newly updated Jet Siphon flushing and 360-degree hidden water holes around toilet bowls. Just a slightly press of the toilet flush button will generate sufficient force to discharge the water rapidly and powerfully. The efficient flushing action of the 360-degree jet siphon system helps to quickly remove waste and prevent lingering odors in the bowl. It creates a more pleasant bathroom experience.

【Easy to Clean and Maintenance Toilet】Thanks to the 360-degree jet siphon system, the toilet has powerful ability to handle waste efficiently. the powerful water flow will helps prevent clogs. Thus this bathroom toilet is easy to clean and maintenance. You'll spend less time dealing with clogs and staining, allowing for a more convenient and hassle-free toilet experience.

【Water Efficient Toilet】Despite its powerful flushing action, HOMLYLINK 360-degree jet siphon toilet is designed to use water efficiently. This tall toilet model uses only average 1.28 gallons of water per flush, which is significantly less than older conventional toilets. You can achieve a clean bowl with less water. This bathroom toilet comfort height elongated will reduce your water bills, making it a financially savvy choice in the long run.

【Stylish Design Elongated Seat Toilets】HOMLYLINK toilet is in sleek design and match any style décor of your bathroom. The toilet for bathroom has a longer bowl shape compared to round seat toilets. This extra length provides more surface area and space for users, making sitting more comfortably, especially for adults. The elongated shape accommodates a broader range of body sizes and allows for a more natural seating position.

【Soft Close Seat】HOMLYLINK toilets come with premium quality soft-close seat. The Soft-close seat toilet for bathrooms can prevent middle-of-the-night disturbances caused by loud toilet seat slamming. This modern toilet contributes to a more peaceful and uninterrupted sleep for everyone.

【All in One Package】The bathroom toilet that came with all the necessary parts to install. In the toliet package box, you will get toilet bowl, water tank(water flush assembled), soft close toilet seat, wax ring and all hardware needed for a quick installation.

【High-temperature Firing Toilet】HOMLYLINK toilets have a high porcelainization due to the high-temperature firing. Highly porcelainized toilet glaze bring a low water absorption rate, which can protect the bathroom toilet from cracking easily. 2-year Limited warranty on toilets, flushing mechanism and Soft-Closing toilet seat lid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am the shortest in my house and the toilet we had was a little low for us. We needed to replace it and was checking out various models. I seen this and got it as it was exactly what we had wanted. Perfect height for us and we don't feel like we're sinking into the ground. Comfortable to sit on, love the quiet close lid. The dual flushing saves on water. Very powerful flush as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great value for a tall toilet with an elongated bowl. The toilet is complete with the tank already assembled, slow close seat and lid and dual flush. The innovative cyclone water flow keeps the bowl clean while only using 1.28 gallons
